revision.text:
== Welcome to the ObjectiveEarth Wiki! ==
Objective.earth is a social OKR tool that helps the community to align themselves towards the 17 SDG goals. It is also a social network, where the community can talk about "Problems of a region" and "Solutions for those problems". On Objective.earth, any individual or organization will be able to crowdfund and hire people to solve the problems they care about.OE platform strongly believes in appreciating and rewarding those who are stepping forward to the right thing for the earth. Read more Rewarding DOers..
We're a collaborative community website about ObjectiveEarth that anyone, including you, can build and expand. Wikis like this one depend on readers getting involved and adding content.
=== Problem Types ===
{{#cargo_query:tables=Problem_Type |fields=_pageName=Name |format=ul }}

* navigation ** mainpage|mainpage-description ** recentchanges-url|recentchanges ** randompage-url|randompage ** helppage|help-mediawiki
* Contribute ** Special:AddProblem|Add a Problem ** Form:Solution|Add a Solution ** Form:Measurement|Add a Measurement ** Form:Problem_Type|Add a Problem Type ** Form:Solution_Type|Add a Solution Type ** Form:Project|Create a Project ** Form:Job|Add a Job
* Data ** Category:Problem|Problems ** Category:Problem_Type|Problem Types ** Category:Solution|Solutions ** Category:Solution_Type|Solution Types ** Category:Project|Projects ** Category:Job|Volunteer Jobs ** Category:Measurement|Measurements
* Objective Earth ** ObjectiveEarth:About | About Objective.Earth ** ObjectiveEarth:WHYs| WHYs
* SEARCH * TOOLBOX * LANGUAGES

<noinclude>
{{#template_params:page_id|vote_type|user_id|created_at|updated_at}}
{{#cargo_declare:_table=Upvote|page_id=Integer|vote_type=String|user_id=Integer|created_at=Datetime|updated_at=Datetime}}
</noinclude><includeonly>{{#cargo_store:_table=Upvote}}
{{#template_display:_format=standard}}</includeonly>

This is the "Problem" form. '''An example page name would be Hunger, India.''' To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=Problem|autocomplete on category=Problem}}
{{{for template|Problem}}} {| class="formtable" ! Region: | {{{field|Region|input type=text|helptext=Select a region here|class=readonly|restricted=temp-xyz231-group}}} |- ! Description: | {{{field|Description|input type=textarea|autogrow|helptext=Write some description about this Problem}}} | {{{field|parent|hidden}}} | {{{field|country|hidden}}} | {{{field|state|hidden}}} | {{{field|city|hidden}}} | {{{field|coordinate|hidden}}} |- ! References: | {{{field|Reference_URLs|input type=tokens|delimiter=,}}} |- |} {{{end template}}}

This is the "Problem Type" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=Problem Type|autocomplete on category=Problem Type}}
{{{for template|Problem Type}}} {| class="formtable" ! Type: | {{{field|Name|helptext=Write the type of Problem.}}} |- ! Results of {{PAGENAME}}: | {{{field|Effects|input type=tokens|helptext=Enter Result of the above problem type}}} |- ! Same As: | {{{field|Same As|input type=tokens|helptext=Drop links of references seperated by commas (,) for this Problem Type like Wikipedia Page, related SDGs etc.}}} |- ! Measurement: | {{{field|Measurement|input type=tokens|cargo table=Measurement|cargo field=_pageName|placeholder=Select related Measurement Parameters|existing values only}}} |- ! Description: | {{{field|Description|input type=textarea|helptext=Write some description about this Problem Type}}} |- ! References: | {{{field|Reference_URLs|input type=tokens|delimiter=,}}} |- |} {{{end template}}}

This is the "Solution" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=Solution|autocomplete on category=Solution}}
{{{for template|Solution}}} {| class="formtable" ! Solution Type: | {{{field|Solution Type|input type=tokens|values from category=Solution_Type|helptext=Choose the solution type for this solution|existing values only}}} |- ! Region: | {{{field|Region|input type=dropdown|class=select_region|values=Select region from dropdown |size=200|placeholder=Search Region|helptext=Select the region}}} | {{{field|country|hidden|class=country}}} | {{{field|state|hidden|class=state}}} | {{{field|city|hidden|class=city}}} | {{{field|coordinate|hidden|class=coordinate}}} |- ! Problem: | {{{field|Problems|input type=tokens|cargo table=Problem|cargo field=_pageName|delimiter=-|existing values only|helptext=Select the related problem}}} |- ! How this works: | {{{field|How this works|input type=textarea|autogrow|helptext=Please eleborate how your solution works}}} |- | {{{field|parentProblem|hidden}}} |- ! References: | {{{field|Reference_URLs|input type=tokens|delimiter=,}}} |- |} {{{end template}}}

This is the "Solution Type" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=Solution Type|autocomplete on category=Solution Type}}
{{{for template|Solution Type}}} {| class="formtable" ! Name: | {{{field|Name}}} |- ! Solves: | {{{field|Solves Problem|input type=tokens|cargo table=Problem_Type|cargo field=Name}}} ! Measurement: | {{{field|Measurement|input type=tokens|cargo table=Measurement_Type|cargo field=Type}}} |- ! Same As: | {{{field|Same As}}} |- |- ! References: | {{{field|Reference_URLs|input type=tokens|delimiter=,}}} |- |} {{{end template}}}

This is the "Project" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=Project|autocomplete on category=Project}}
{{{for template|Project}}} {| class="formtable" ! Region: | {{{field|Region|input type=tokens|cargo table=City|cargo field=_pageName|helptext=Select a region|existing values only}}} |- ! Problem: | {{{field|Problem|input type=tokens|cargo table=Problem|cargo field=_pageName|depends on=Project[Region]|depends on field=Region|delimiter=-|existing values only|helptext=Select related Problem}}} |- ! Solution: | {{{field|Solution|input type=tokens|cargo table=Solution|cargo field=_pageName|depends on=Project[Region]|depends on field=Region|delimiter=-|existing values only||helptext=Select related Solution}}} |- ! Overview: | {{{field|Overview|input type=textarea|autogrow||helptext=Write a overview of this Project}}} |- ! Feature Image: | {{{field|Feature Image|uploadable|image preview|helptext=Enter file name by searching files in Special:ListFiles or click on upload files }}} |- | {{{field|parentSolution|hidden}}} |- ! References: | {{{field|Reference_URLs|input type=tokens|delimiter=,}}} |- |} {{{end template}}}

This is the "Measurement" form. Contribute here by adding measurement unit accepted in your region. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; '''please include the parameter type in the page name''' to avoid name collisions, if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=Measurement|autocomplete on category=Measurement}}
{{{for template|Measurement}}} {| class="formtable" ! Parameter Name: | {{{field|Parameter Name|helptext=Write the Name of the corresponding parameter to measurement}}} |- ! Unit Type: | {{{field|Unit Type|helptext=Write the unit of the parameter}}} |- ! Value Range (Low): | {{{field|Range Low|helptext=Enter the lowest range value for the above unit type.}}} |- ! Value Range (High): | {{{field|Range High|helptext=Enter the highest range value for the above unit type.}}} |- ! Same As: | {{{field|Same As|input type=tokens|helptext=Drop links of references seperated by commas (,) for this Measurement like Wikipedia Page, related Articles etc.}}} |- ! References: | {{{field|Reference_URLs|input type=tokens|delimiter=,}}} |- |} {{{end template}}}

This is the "Job" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; '''please include the prefix Job in the page name to avoid name collisions''', if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=Job|autocomplete on category=Job}}
{{{for template|Job}}} {| class="formtable" ! Role: | {{{field|Role}}} |- ! Position: | {{{field|Position}}} |- ! Expertise Level: | {{{field|Expertise Level}}} |- ! Region: | {{{field|Region|input type=tokens|cargo table=City|cargo field=_pageName}}} |- ! Project: | {{{field|Project|input type=tokens|cargo table=Project|cargo field=_pageName|depends on=Job[Region]|depends on field=Region}}} |- ! Description: | {{{field|Description|input type=textarea|autogrow}}} |- ! You should Do: | {{{field|Task|input type=textarea|autogrow}}} |- ! You will Get: | {{{field|Reward|input type=textarea|autogrow}}} |- |} {{{end template}}}
{{#default_form:Problem}}

{{#template_params:Region|Reference_URLs (label=References)}} {{#cargo_declare:_table=Problem|Reference_URLs=List (,) of URL|Region=Text|Description=Wikitext|parent=Integer|country=Text|state=Text|city=Text|coordinate=Coordinates}} {{#cargo_store:_table=Problem}} {{#template_display:_format=infobox}} {{#cargo_query: tables=Problem |fields=Description |where=Problem._pageID={{PAGEID}} |format=standard }}
==How we are measuring it?==
{{#measurement_values: {{{Problem Type}}} | {{PAGENAME}} }}
==Sub Problems of {{PAGENAME}}==

[{{fullurl:Special:AddSubProblem|parent={{PAGEID}} }} Add Sub Problem]



{{#cargo_query:tables=Problem=P,Upvote=U |join on=P._pageID = U.page_id |fields=P._pageName=Problem Name,P._pageID=page_id,CONCAT( LEFT( P.Description, 350 ), IF( LENGTH( P.Description ) > 200, '...', '' ) ) = Description,COUNT(U.vote_type)=Upvotes |where=P.parent={{PAGEID}} AND (U.vote_type IS NULL OR U.vote_type='up') |group by=P._pageName,P._pageID,P.Description |order by=Upvotes DESC |limit=5 |format=template |template=Show Sub Problems |named args=yes }}


==Solutions of {{PAGENAME}}==

[{{fullurl:Form:Solution}} Add a Solution]



{{#cargo_query:tables=Solution=S, Problem=P, Upvote=U |join on=S.Problems HOLDS P._pageName,S._pageID = U.page_id |fields=S._pageName=Solution Name,,S._pageID=page_id,S.How_this_works=Description,COUNT(U.vote_type)=Upvotes |where=S.Problems HOLDS '{{PAGENAME}}' AND (U.vote_type IS NULL OR U.vote_type='up') |group by=U.vote_type,S._pageName,S.How_this_works,S._pageID |order by=Upvotes DESC |limit=5 |format=template |template=Show Related Solutions |named args=yes }}

==Projects of {{PAGENAME}}==

[{{fullurl:Form:Project}} Add a Project]


{{#cargo_query:tables=Project=Pj, Problem=P, Upvote=U |join on=Pj.Problem HOLDS P._pageName,Pj._pageID = U.page_id |fields=Pj._pageName=Project Name,Pj._pageID=page_id,CONCAT( LEFT( Pj.Overview, 350 ), IF( LENGTH( Pj.Overview ) > 200, '...', '' ) ) = Overview, Pj.Feature_Image = Feature_Image,COUNT(U.vote_type)=Upvotes |where=Pj.Problem HOLDS '{{PAGENAME}}' AND (U.vote_type IS NULL OR U.vote_type='up') |group by=U.vote_type,Pj._pageName,Pj.Feature_Image,Pj.Overview,Pj._pageID |order by=Upvotes DESC |limit=5 |format=template |template=Show Related Projects |named args=yes }}

==Have something to say about this problem? == [[Category:Problem]]

{{#template_params:Name|Same As|Measurement|Effects(label=Results of {{PAGENAME}} )|Reference_URLs (label=References)}} {{#cargo_declare:_table=Problem_Type|Name=String|Same_As=List (,) of String|Measurement=List (,) of Page|Effects=List (,) of String|Reference_URLs=List (,) of URL|Description=Wikitext}} {{#cargo_store:_table=Problem_Type}} {{#template_display:_format=infobox}} == Problem Description == {{#cargo_query: tables=Problem_Type |fields=Description |format=standard |where=Problem_Type._pageID={{PAGEID}} }} == How are we measuring? ==
{{#cargo_query:tables=Problem_Type=pt,Measurement=m |join on=m.Parameter_Name HOLDS pt.Measurement |fields=m.Parameter_Name=Parameter Name,m.Unit_Type=Unit Type,m.Range_Low=Range (Low Value),m.Range_High= Range (High Value) |where=pt.Name = '{{{Name}}}' |format=table }}

== Linked Solution Types ==

[{{fullurl:Form:Solution_Type }} Add Solution Type]


{{#cargo_query: tables=Solution_Type__Solves_Problem,Solution_Type |join on=Solution_Type__Solves_Problem._rowID=Solution_Type._ID |fields=Solution_Type._pageName=Name |where=Solution_Type__Solves_Problem._value="{{{Name}}}" |limit=3 |format=ul }} [[Category:Problem Type]]

{{#template_params:Solution Type|How this works|Region|Problems|Reference_URLs (label=References)}} {{#cargo_declare:_table=Solution|Solution_Type=Page|How_this_works=Wikitext|parentProblem=Integer|Problems=List (-) of String|Region=Text|country=Text|state=Text|city=Text|Reference_URLs=List (,) of URL|coordinates=Coordinates}} {{#cargo_store:_table=Solution}} {{#template_display:_format=standard}}

revision.comment: Created page with "<!-- Begin CSS Flexbox --> <div style="display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap;"> <!-- Section 1 OE About --> <div style="flex: 1 0 100%; position: relative; clear:left; float: left; box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0 0 1em 0; width: 100%; padding-left: 60px; text-align: center;"> =[[File:Logo.png|32px|text-bottom|alt=|link=]] '''WHAT is Objective.Earth'''= [[Wikibooks:Welcome|'''Welcome to Objective.Earth!''']] Objective.Earth is a social network, where you can talk about "P..."
revision.text:
=[[File:Logo.png|32px|text-bottom|alt=|link=]] '''WHAT is Objective.Earth'''= [[Wikibooks:Welcome|'''Welcome to Objective.Earth!''']] Objective.Earth is a social network, where you can talk about "Problems of a region" and "Solutions for those problems". Crowdfunds will enable community to sponsor the users who are applying those solutions in the region.
[[File:HelpPage_IconPack-05.png|51px|alt=|link=]]
==Aligning Mankind- with '''WHYs'''== As a community, we often are not aligned on WHY something must be done. Drawing inspiration from OKR framework, we intend to align people worldwide by advertising them with "Flashcards of WHYs". People would crowdsource on WHYs, and allocate tasks to each other. See Aligning Mankind...
[[File:HelpPage_IconPack-03.png|51px|alt=|link=]]
==Rewarding People - for Doing it '''Right'''== Ok, I might get convinced with some WHYs - say "Why planting trees is so much crucial". But "Doing such right things" is often costlier! Objective.Earth would run crowdfunds, and reward those people who are stepping forward to "Do it right". Read more Rewarding DOers..
[[File:HelpPage_IconPack-03.png|51px|alt=|link=]]
==Sneak Peak== When user googles for 'Climate on Earth" we would land the user on this page. Kindly contribute to Product Design and make it better.
[[File:Aligning-mankind-with-whys.png|center|700px|alt=|link=]]
Users can click on "Climate" dropdown or "Earth" dropdown on top left - and switch to their favorite region, or to thousands of other causes that concern them.

‎IexM8XV1rnI

==Problem: population Aware of SDGs==
[https://globalgoals.org/ Sustainability Development Goals] (SDGs) are important for humans to thrive on earth. Mankind may fail to achieve these goals if majority of our population is not aware of them.
{| class="wikitable" |- |in 2015 |in 2027 |- |less than half the world's population is aware of SDGs |90% of world's population becomes aware of SDGs |} See [https..."
revision.text:
Education : WHAT needs to be done, WHY and HOW.
==Problem: population Aware of SDGs==
[https://globalgoals.org/ Sustainability Development Goals] (SDGs) are important for humans to thrive on earth. Mankind may fail to achieve these goals if majority of our population is not aware of them.
{| class="wikitable" |- |in 2015 |in 2027 |- |less than half the world's population is aware of SDGs |90% of world's population becomes aware of SDGs |} See [https://globalgoals.org/ Source] ===Solutions=== # [https://www.objective.earth/whys/aligning-mankind/campaigns-to-educate-99-of-population-on-sdgs Campaigns to educate 99% of population on SDGs.] # Contribute more solutions here ==Problem: population Working on SDGs== Mankind may fail to achieve SDGs if "sizeable" population does not know their tasks, what tasks others are doing, the progress everyone collectively is making to accomplish goals. {| class="wikitable" |- |in 2021 |in 2024 |- |no source available right now on how many people are actively working on SDGs. Please contribute here |5% of population actively working on SDGs |} See [https://www.objective.earth/whys/aligning-mankind/source-of-information/source-population-that-is-working-on-sdgs Source] ===Solutions=== # [https://www.objective.earth/whys/aligning-mankind/social-network-with-okr-objective.earth Social Network + OKR = Objective.Earth] # Contribute more solutions here.. '''<- Previous''' * [[ObjectiveEarth:WHYs|WHYs]] '''Next ->''' * [[ObjectiveEarth:WHYs/Educate 99% population on SDGs]]
